Like I said, my name is Jeevan.

So, Brian… just want to quickly summarize the conversation we had a couple of weeks ago, you had with Alex.
I've got some notes over here.

Currently, you help manage property rentals and maintenance across about 400 properties, and you've got a team using a shared Gmail inbox to manage incoming maintenance requests, complaints, work orders from your inspectors.

You currently use another tool called fisma for generating work orders if I understand that correctly, but you are looking for a way to better manage the shared inbox where work orders and requirements come in and hiver sort of what it does is it helps add a… layer of functionality on top of Gmail, which can help you manage your inbox better without having your team learn a different software or go to a different place sort of like stay inside Gmail, but still have the tools to manage it better.
So, the objective of the call today is to help you get started with an actual trial, of course, happy to answer questions, do a quick tour as we go.
But that's what I've got, from my notes so far, Brian, anything that you want to add?

So we start with the base.
